summary: Godzilla saves Tokyo from a flying saucer that transforms into the beast Orga.
cast: Takehiro Murata|Hiroshi Abe|Naomi Nishida|Mayu Suzuki|Shirô Sano|Takeshi Ôbayashi|Shirô Namiki|Sakae Kimura|Bengal|Ken'ichi Nagira|Ken'ichi Ishii|Yoshimasa Kondô|Kôichi Ueda|Yoshiyuki Omori|Masahiko Nishimura|Satomi Achiwa|Denden|Atsuko Kohata|Yutaka Matsushige|Dangaruriyasu|Shelley Sweeney|Daisuke Ishizuka|Toshihiko Sakakibara|Yoshikazu Ishii|Terumi Yoshida|Tsutomu Kitagawa|Makoto Itô|Natalia Adams|Amy Hill|Ron Yuan|Yoshiki Arizono|Yoshio Be|François Chau|Glen Chin|John Cho|Rachel Crane|Michael Hagiwara|Denise Iketani|Jim Ishida|Rodney Kageyama|Denice Kumagai|Jim Lau|Dana Lee|Lucy Lin|Jack Ong|Anthony J Sacco|Yûki Tanaka|Marilyn Tokuda|Jerry Tondo|Ping Wu|Norman England|Michael Schlesinger
title: Gojira ni-sen mireniamu
